item.title: Building High-Performance Backends with Gin in Go
item.description: Introduction Gin is a web framework for Go that focuses on high performance and productivity. It’s perfect for building fast, scalable backend services. This guide will walk you through the basics of using Gin to create a performant backend. Table of Contents Installation Basic Setup Routing Handling Requests Middleware Grouping Routes Performance Tips Installation To get started with Gin, you first need to install it: go get -u github.com/gin-gonic/gin Basic Setup Here’s a basic example of setting up a Gin server:
